titleStmt.title: Mr. Charles Dallison recordr [sic] of Lincoln, his speech to the Kings Majesty
titleStmt.author: Dallison, Charles, d. 1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for William Gay, and are to be sold at his shop in Hosherlane at the signe of the Axe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
